item.title: Hyundai Cuts Profit Outlook on Spending to Skirt Tariffs
item.description: Hyundai Motor Co. raised its revenue forecast for 2025 while paring profit expectations as the South Korean automaker accelerates investment in the US to mitigate tariff costs.

item.title: Battery Plant Delayed After Immigration Raid: Hyundai
item.description: Construction on a Hyundai Motor Co.-LG battery plant in Georgia that was raided by US immigration authorities is being delayed as the companies face labor shortages. Bloomberg’s Denny Thomas explores
